message_1: Suppose that you intercepted a message that was encrypted using a Caesar cipher with a shift of 7. The encrypted message is "MAYOW". What is the original message?
message_2:
To decrypt the message, we need to reverse the Caesar cipher by shifting the letters back by 7 positions.

M -> L -> K -> J -> I -> H -> G -> F
A -> Z -> Y -> X -> W -> V -> U -> T
Y -> X -> W -> V -> U -> T -> S -> R
O -> N -> M -> L -> K -> J -> I -> H
W -> V -> U -> T -> S -> R -> Q -> P

The original message is "FTRHP".
